Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2009 04:00PM Patti3 wrote: Hey Girls..Only found you with some help from KLYNN, still having a tough time navigating this site..NOT good on the computer!! lol Thanks Kelly for the wonderful party!! So nice to meet you and all the girls..I totally enjoyed chatting with you all..Welcome Crissy, Graceann and Karen, you are all soooo sweet-sorry we had to meet under these circumstances but you girls are so beautiful inside and out. I know that we will meet up again, hope you can make it out to visit with the Jersey girls someday! ps. Karen, I am the one youre getting a tattoo with!! lol, when you get a chance check out Angel of Courage by Willow Tree, I think you can find a picture online..thats similar to what Im planning for myself. Hope we can all get together again soon, YOU ALL ROCK! hugs, patti3
Posts.Title: This is the "What Would You Like To Bring to the Pahtay" Thread KellyC AnnNYC
